title: T206  Ty Cobb Red Portrait with great centering SOLD

posts.post_title: T206  Ty Cobb Red Portrait with great centering SOLD
posts.post_content:
SOLD delivered regular PP. SOLD for PP FF, cash, check, or MO.

Here is a beautiful well centered Red Cobb that used to be in a PSA 1.5 slab. The member I got it from is not a graded collector so he cracked it out.
